lead_paragraph: Back together again, British duo Bradley Wiggins and Mark Cavendish proved the long wait had been worthwhile as they reunited in a blaze of glory to win Madison gold at the world track championships on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Wiggins and Cavendish Enjoy One Last Golden Gig
headline.main: Wiggins and Cavendish Enjoy One Last Golden Gig

snippet: Back together again, British duo Bradley Wiggins and Mark Cavendish proved the long wait had been worthwhile as they reunited in a blaze of glory to win Madison gold at the world track championships on Sunday....
